com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load
Class HBaseSlice

java.lang.Object
  com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load.HBaseSlice
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.pig.Slice
public class HBaseSlice
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.pig.Slice

HBase Slice to load a portion of range of a table. The key range will be [start, end) Modeled from org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapred.TableSplit.

See Also:
